summary: Two gentlemen of fortune from the times of Imperial Russia are looking for an uncountable treasure at the dawn of the Soviet Union age.
cast: Archil Gomiashvili|Sergey Filippov|Mikhail Pugovkin|Natalya Krachkovskaya|Natalya Vorobyova|Glikeriya Bogdanova-Chesnokova|Nina Grebeshkova|Yuriy Nikulin|Natalya Varley|Klara Rumyanova|Leonid Gaidai|Igor Yasulovich|Georgiy Vitsin|Saveliy Kramarov|Viktor Pavlov|Gotlib Roninson|Vladimir Etush|Roman Filippov|Grigoriy Shpigel|Yevdokiya Urusova|Rina Zelyonaya|Nina Lapshinova|Nina Agapova|Ruslan Akhmetov|Eduard Bredun|Aleksandr Denisov|Vladimir Dorofeyev|Vladimir Ferapontov|Erast Garin|Shalva Gejadze|Georgiy Georgiu|Nikolay Gorlov|Aleksandr Khvylya|Viktor Kolpakov|Yuriy Medvedev|Radner Muratov|Irina Murzayeva|Nikolai Pazhitnov|Viktor Uralskiy|Pavel Vinnik|Ivan Zhevago|Anatoliy Kalabulin|Yuriy Sarantsev|Nelli Vitepash
title: 12 stulev
